Dialogue: Ah ha! The spy Is finally awake!
I bet we left a good bump on your head from our trusty flashlight!
What? What do you mean the world was supposed to end?
(I know we can't trust him, let me handle this.)
Stop asking questions! We'll be the ones doing the talking!
So you thought you could catch us huh? You really thought It would be that easy?
(Shut up, shut up! Stop bothering me!)
Flake really has reached rock bottom now that he's got kids doing his dirty work.
First he was dumping his toxic waste into the sea, and now he plans to tear down the forest to open a factory?!
(He has no regard for life! The spawn of the devil!)
You're just a kid, so you don't understand the consequences that will occur if his plan succeeds.
Wait he didn't tell you about that? So you're not even working for him?
Well if that's the case, sorry for knocking your lights out. But we're not so sure we believe you.
(Maybe this could work out in our favor, this kid could help us.)
Now that you know what Flake is really up to, you understand why we need to end this.
Prove you're on our side by helping us take him down.
We have to stay hidden, but you don't. Get us something to use against him.
Bug spray?
Interesting... But it'll work.
(I know! This is gonna make him suffer!)
One more thing, go tell the gravekeeper, dig a hole for one. Maybe two more for those shitheads who follow him around.
Here's the key to the graveyard gate. We stole it when we ran away.
We'll be here. Come find us when you have something we can use.
(We have a fighting chance now!)
Your job here is done, we appreciate your efforts. Now leave the rest to us.
